attributes.action: form an emergency coalition government to save uk from bankruptcy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
impose emergency measures
 windfall taxes on BP BRITISH GAS and water companies etc
invite team from commerce and industry Branson etc to assist
period of 24 months
form a goverment of all parties to stop point scoring and focus on saving us from financial breakdown

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
